Actions.Name: Blast
Effects: Deal 2 piercing damage again to all characters for each character caught in the area.
Attack target is burning. If attack targets a burning character, increase blast size to 2.

Actions.Name: Embers
Actions.AreaEffect: 2 piercing damage and one foe in the area becomes burning. Burning foes take 2 piercing damage, twice.

Actions.Name: Flash
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 is vulnerable. Vulnerable foes take 2 piercing damage and become burning.
